content: a pattern 3in1 - baby cow daddy cow and mommy cow if you need only one cow you ll need about 2 balls of white or brown yarn + some cream and black if you want to crochet all 3 cows well you ll need way more yarn you can use a hook size between 3mm and 3 5mm and depends on your gauge you ll use more or less yarn daddy cow uses most amount of yarn pattern requires sewing level i d say is intermediate don t hesitate to message me if you have any problems with this pattern enjoy your crocheting
